item.description:
March 31st: 6th Annual Reunion Dance in Beverly, MA

This event was started 6 years ago by Biz and Eileen to reunite friends that have been dancing together from all of the great venues that have closed down in the past 6 years. This year MRB is teaming up with them. If you have not been to one of these dances, it is one of the biggest parties of the year ! Call, e-mail, or get your tickets at MRB on any Saturday night. Find out how you can win Kenny Chesney tickets with the purchase of a ticket !!

 

Midnight Rodeo in Manchester will still be open on March 31st with Michelle Jackson taking over as Dance Instructor and DJ. Boys of Rockingham will be performing!

Meetup will be held @ MRB in Manchester...

 

$10 cover

21+
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup sign at the table before the bar @ MRB
item.name: 6th Annual Reunion Dance in Beverly, MA AND MRB Line/Partner Dancing
